price: (Wͻn a wiase ho) na wͻn nimdeε kͻpem no. Nokorε sε, wo Wura Nyankopͻn Nim nea wayera afri Ne kwan no soͻ, εna Ɔnim nea ͻnam kwan tenenee no nso soͻ.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مَبۡلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika mablaghuhum mina al-ʿil'mi inna rabbaka huwa aʿlamu biman ḍalla ʿan sabīlihi wahuwa aʿlamu bimani ih'tadā
